column3: Should the fixup be squashed first before merging this?
utAck 645946d.\n\nLater work needs to clean up the TxConfirmedStats pointer usage, but that is a complex refactor and outside the scope of this PR.
utACK 68af6514987d9d7bfcd67caa9394edda6ab5ef2c. Nice cleanups, seems good to move this stuff out of the mempool.

For previous related work see #7145 and #7115 

utACK individual commits: ae7327b8322d36d00047e92fe699371185de1c68 f6187d6e393b5ca587604b678f91496d50149a20 dbb9e3699b8e835fd72a5db2c22927d828484c32 2332f19bef025c22fab5a96a0cd2d52d22489aa2
fast review ACK individual commits: 14e10aa842b8583f9648accd5d151dbdf342b9dc 5ba81e54e0390ec0be7dbc8ebea0c35933442a8a 68af6514987d9d7bfcd67caa9394edda6ab5ef
Probably best to still check the nVersion before reading any further, no?
oops.  thats a pretty big oversight. will fix.

heh... i agree, but i wanted to move code to .cpp file and then i was screwed by lack of a destructor.  I'm sure there is a better way, but I went around in circles chasing my tail for a while..  Maybe we could save that for an actual programmer to clean up later.
